page.title: 08THE SCHOOL
page.content: Goodnestone school is a small country Primary School. This year is our 150th Anniversary, which we celebrated in the Summer Term. One third of the children come from Chillenden and Goodnestone, the rest come from outside our Parish. We learn all the usual school subjects such as Maths and English. We also learn to play recorders, tenor, descant, treble and sopranino. We learn French. We some_ times go on trips to the continent, last time we went to Katwijk in Holland. French children come to our school to study in the summer. We go to Nonington college for swimming and gymnastics. Nonington college is closing soon.
